Name: Autumn Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out the flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.  (You shouldn't need to dry shake to achieve desired foam head.)
Review: An easy-drinking, fruity cocktail with grassy hints courtesy of bison vodka.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly and inspired by Max Warner's excellent Autumn Punch . In keeping with every cocktail served straight-up and in a Marting glass in those days, this was originally named Autum Marini, it was an Alternatini .
